TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {26168=2012 - Burks appeared in three games as a defensive back making six tackles, five solo, with two pass break-ups and one interception on the year. Recorded a season-high three tackles, all solo, along with an interception against Pittsburg State. Made a solo tackle with a pass break-up against South Dakota School of Mines, and had two tackles with a pass break-up against Truman., 25790=2013 - Burks started all 10 games at cornerback as a sophomore making 13 tackles on the year...Had a pair of interceptions returned for 24 yards while breaking up three passes...Had a season-high four tackles twice in wins at home over Central Oklahoma and Lincoln...Had interceptions versus Central Oklahoma and Southwest Baptist.}
